snippet: Alison Smale, executive editor of the International Herald Tribune, introduces a panel of activists from around the world who explore what happens to women's rights "When Culture Clashes With Law."
abstract: Alison Smale, executive editor of the International Herald Tribune, introduces a panel of activists from around the world who explore what happens to women's rights "When Culture Clashes With Law."

headline.main: Trust Women Conference: The Biggest Issues in Women's Rights
